steps_string:
Steps( Begin(), 
Change_Box_Number(the_instruction_box(step_number(9), 1), increase(1)),
Put(number_in_box(6), into_box(5)),
Verify(greater_than(instruction_box_number(step_number(2), 1), number_in_box(3)), then_go_to_step(6), then_go_to_step(7)),
Change_Box_Number(the_instruction_box(step_number(2), 1), increase(1)),
Verify(greater_than(instruction_box_number(step_number(2), 1), number_in_box(6)), then_go_to_step(8), then_go_to_step(1)),
Operation(Multiply(), number_in_box(2), number_in_box(8), put_result_into_box(5)),
Verify(greater_than(instruction_box_number(step_number(2), 2), number_in_box(7)), then_go_to_step(4), then_go_to_step(7)),
Change_Box_Number(the_instruction_box(step_number(2), 2), increase(1)),
Put(number_in_box(3), into_box(2)), End())
question: What number is now in Box 5?
question_zh: 经过以上操作之后，现在5号盒子中的数字是多少?
desc: Change Instruction 9: Increase the first box number mentioned in it by 1
Put ( number in box 6 ) into box 5
Is the first box number mentioned in Instruction 2 greater than ( number in box 3 )
Change Instruction 2: Increase the first box number mentioned in it by 1
Is the first box number mentioned in Instruction 2 greater than ( number in box 6 )
Multiply: ( number in box 2 ) * ( number in box 8 ), put result into box 5.
Is the second box number mentioned in Instruction 2 greater than ( number in box 7 )
Change Instruction 2: Increase the second box number mentioned in it by 1
Put ( number in box 3 ) into box 2
desc_zh: 更改指令9：将该指令中的第1个盒子的编号加1
将6号盒子中的数字放在5号盒子中
判断：指令2中第1个盒子的编号比3号盒子中的数字大吗
更改指令2：将该指令中的第1个盒子的编号加1
判断：指令2中第1个盒子的编号比6号盒子中的数字大吗
相乘：2号盒子中的数字*8号盒子中的数字，将结果放在5号盒子中。
判断：指令2中第2个盒子的编号比7号盒子中的数字大吗
更改指令2：将该指令中的第2个盒子的编号加1
将3号盒子中的数字放在2号盒子中
